name: StalkerStory
description:
Stalker Story - 2D shooter with elements of survival. The game takes place on the territory of Chernobyl after the second explosion of a nuclear power plant. Can you survive in the harsh Chernobyl Exclusion Zone and write your own story?

Control:
Movement - WASD
Running - Shift
Steal - Ctrl
Shot / Strike - Left mouse button
For interaction - Right mouse button
Reload - R
Throw Item - G
Inventory - E
PDA - P
Pause - Esc

Because this is the first version of the game, you can meet bugs, shortcomings.
Suddenly you met with a bug or a defect - write to the personal messages of the miRorO group on VKontakte. Thanks.
If your browser or Microsoft Defender "swears" - this is normal and there are no viruses in the game!

Website: https://miroro-team.github.io/
Group in VKontakte: https://vk.com/miroro.team
Platform: Microsoft Windows
Engine: Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Developer
